sentences.en: a player who would always sign autographs and chat with fans
sentences.cn: 总是会亲笔签名并与球迷交谈的一名球员

sentences.en: a shirt autographed by the whole team
sentences.cn: 一件有全体队员签名的衬衫

sentences.en: Can I have your autograph, please ?
sentences.cn: 您能给我签个名 吗 ?

sentences.en: Could you autograph your book for me, please?
sentences.cn: 能否帮我在您写的书上签名?

sentences.en: Does she ever get asked for her autograph?
sentences.cn: 有人向她索要过签名吗？

sentences.en: Great. When can we get the autograph?
sentences.cn: 太好了. 我们什么时候能得到签名?

sentences.en: I asked the author to autograph my book.
sentences.cn: 我请作者在书上亲笔签名.

sentences.en: I'll be able to get you their autograph if you like.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢,我会让他们给你签名的.

sentences.en: In fact, I'd like your autograph.
sentences.cn: 事实上我想要你的签名.

sentences.en: Please give your autograph as a memento.
She was continually being pestered by journalists and autograph hunters.
sentences.cn: 她不断遭到新闻记者和要求签名者的纠缠.

sentences.en: So then getting her autograph would be completely out of the question?
sentences.cn: 那么问她要签名也是完全不可能的了?

sentences.en: WERE YOU ABLE TO GET THEIR AUTOGRAPH?
sentences.cn: 你想要他们的签名 吗 ?

sentences.en: When police realised who he was, they asked for an autograph and let him off with a warning.
sentences.cn: 警察知道他是谁后，便向他要了签名，然后只给了他个警告就放他走了。

sentences.en: Young autograph hunters clustered around the players' entrance.
sentences.cn: 年轻人都挤在演员入口处索要签名。

words.tran_cn: 亲笔，[图情]手稿；[法]亲笔签名

trans.tran_cn: 亲笔签名，亲笔稿，手稿，真迹石版复制品
trans.tran_en: a famous person’s signature that they give to someone who admires them
if a famous person autographs a book, photograph etc, they sign it

trans.tran_cn: 在…上亲笔签名，亲笔书写，亲笔签字，用石版术复制
